abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Trade and
            Transport Facilitation Project for Macedonia, former
            Yugoslav Republic of is to facilitate the movement of trade
            between the Borrower and neighboring countries in South East
            Europe, through the removal of selected border-zone
            infrastructure bottlenecks and improving the efficiency and
            quality of road and rail services along trans-European
            transport corridor X on the territory of the Borrower. The
            extension is necessary to allow additional time for civil
            works to be completed under one of the project components.
            This will be the second extension of the project. The
            closing date of the project will be extended from March 31,
            2012 until June 30, 2012.
